thread.title: SamMobile Daily Recap: February 22, 2017 — Galaxy S8 and Galaxy S8 Plus pictured together, Gear VR controller and more!
thread.title_full: SamMobile Daily Recap: February 22, 2017 — Galaxy S8 and Galaxy S8 Plus pictured together, Gear VR controller and more!

author: Josh L.
title: SamMobile Daily Recap: February 22, 2017 — Galaxy S8 and Galaxy S8 Plus pictured together, Gear VR controller and more!
text:
Josh L. / 13 hours ago 
We publish a ton of stories on a daily basis. Unfortunately, most of the news breaks during our European hours of operation, which makes it difficult for our readers in the US (and other regions) to keep up with every post. But, we think we’ve come up with the perfect solution — a daily recap . In the list below, you’ll find the stories that went live today. We understand that you’re not going to be interested in all of them, so we’ve split them into their respective categories. If you want to see the latest Galaxy Tab S3 news, simply locate the Tablets subheading. Business
